commit.message:
Update tests submodule

Apply changes in response to editorconfig/editorconfig-core-test#28

Add "-static" and "-pthread" to exe linking flags to all non-Windows system.

Only gcc was detected for these two options before.

Correct the library linked in static build.

In static build, we should find the static pcre2 not the dynamic one.
For ease of maintenance, we also disable the shared library build when
static build is enabled.

Previously we escaped this error because CMake policy <= 3.2 does not
use full path to found linked library and thus the static pcre2 library
sneaks in.

Set cmake policy to version 3.2.

CMake 3.3 seems starting using a different command for static linking,
which breaks our build. Before that is resolved, cmake policy version
3.2 will be used.
Enable VERBOSE output for travis build.

CMake: Fix config file include target exports

This export is required to make the package cmake-relocatable and
find headers correctly for all installation prefixes.
Require CMake 3.5.1 or above
Fix typo in "LICENSE"
Update test submodule.

"?" in glob should be translated to "[^/]" in PCRE.

Fix #58.

Fix two handlings of OOM.

- Check return value of split_file_path in editorconfig_parse()
- Check return value of strndup in ec_glob()

Fix #51
Handling all strdup oom errors wherever applicable.
Handle strdup memory allocation errors in main.c
Define utarray_oom instead of oom for utarray related operations.
Upgrade utarray.h
Check for the return value of all malloc calls.
Polish text in INSTALL.md a bit.

Clarify dependencies.

Fix #56

In ec_glob, fix brace parity determination when a right curly brace is to a left curly brace.

When the numbers of left and right curly braces are equal, current code
determines that curly braces are paired. However, this will cause errors
when the numbers of left curly braces and right braces are equal but
right curly braces are positioned to the left curly braces.

Fix #54
Find both Debug and Release versions of pcre2
Fix FindPCRE2.cmake in case of Debug build with suffix
Variable name change: are_brace_paired -> are_braces_paired
Also include Debug build in CI.
ec_glob should be "static inline".
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:editorconfig/editorconfig-core-c
Move ec_atoi to util.h
Move ec_atoi to util.h

atoi: Handle strings corresponding to integers that are out of int type range.

Fix #53

Do not start header guards with double underscores.

Double underscores are reserved in ISO C99 (Section 7.1.3).

Fix #52

Fix warning "assignment within conditional expression" (C4706) on VS

Signed-off-by: Sven Strickroth <email@cs-ware.de>
